alert.note: Alert for Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 6:02PM MDT until June 24 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR EASTERN SULLY...NORTHWESTERN HYDE...SOUTHWESTERN FAULK AND SOUTHEASTERN POTTER COUNTIES... At 702 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cottonwood Lake Near Agar, or 10 miles southeast of Gettysburg, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stone Lake, Gettysburg and Lebanon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
